sentences.en: He had expected to find Apollonia in her nightgown when he returned, already between the covers.
sentences.cn: 他原来预料,等他回来的时候,就会看到阿波罗妮娅穿上睡衣, 早已躺在被窝里了.

sentences.en: He had simply slipped on a long nightgown with an insertion front.
sentences.cn: 他只随便披上了一件长睡衣,前边敞着领口.

sentences.en: He held his breath and pushed his hand down the bed to touch his nightgown.
sentences.cn: 他屏住呼吸,伸出一只手,顺着床往下摸到了他的睡衣。

sentences.en: I also learned the difference between a fancy dress and a nightgown!
sentences.cn: 我也知道了舞会服装与睡袍的区别!

sentences.en: I am wearing a plaid nightgown trimmed with white lace.
sentences.cn: 我穿着一件带有白色蕾丝花边的格子呢睡衣。

sentences.en: I gave her the silk nightgown.
sentences.cn: 我把丝绸睡衣送给了她。

sentences.en: I hate this nightgown. I hate all my nightgowns, and I hate all my underwear too.
sentences.cn: 安妮:我讨厌这睡袍,我讨厌所有的睡袍. 我也不愿意穿着这些东西睡觉.

sentences.en: I hiked my nightgown right up and I ran.
I prefer something bright for the dress and something pink for the nightgown.
sentences.cn: 我想要一件颜色鲜艳的连衣裙和一件粉红色的睡衣.

sentences.en: Mary: But I'm still in nightgown.
sentences.cn: 玛丽: 但是我现在还穿著睡衣.

sentences.en: She is wearing an evening gown. She is wearing a nightgown.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件晚礼服. 她穿着一件睡衣.

sentences.en: She pulled the strap of her nightgown onto her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她将自己睡袍的吊带拉到肩膀上。

sentences.en: She rose in her pale nightgown.
sentences.cn: 她起了床,穿着淡色的睡袍.

sentences.en: Watson was reading the paper about some young woman in Kensington who was run over. Had no business in the street at that hour. I believe she was in her nightgown.
sentences.cn: 我拿到电报的时候华生正在读一篇关于肯辛顿某个年轻女人被车撞死的新闻，时间是晚上，街道上没什么人，我想当时那悲惨的女人还穿着她的睡衣呢。

sentences.en: Without thinking, she pelted down the stairs in her nightgown.
sentences.cn: 她想都没想，穿着睡衣就飞奔下了楼。

words.tran_cn: 女式睡衣；孩子穿的睡衣
